strategy_reasoning: Using the 'Cozy Garden Maintenance' metaphor to represent technical fixes and optimizations. This aligns with the organic/growth brand identity while making dry technical updates (APIs, dashboards, bug fixes) feel satisfying and warm.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot wearing a tiny toolbelt, polishing a glowing lime green (#ecf874) gem in a cluttered but cute workshop. Soft lavender and peach gradient background. Warm lighting, chunky 8-bit sprites, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'Weekly Polish'. Nostalgic, productive vibes.
images.description: Cover image establishing the theme of maintenance and polish.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art showing a painting canvas stretching from a square into a wide panoramic landscape. A tiny pixel artist character is painting a sunset. Soft lime green (#ecf874) grass, pastel sky. Visualizing 'aspect ratio freedom'. Cozy, warm lighting, clean UI elements like a creative app. Text: 'No More Squares'.
images.description: Visualizing the Klein-9b aspect ratio fix ‚Äì freedom from square constraints.

images.prompt: Close-up of a retro game inventory screen or dashboard. Very clean and organized. One large glowing gold coin stack representing 'Unified Balance'. Background is a soft lime green (#ecf874) grid. Pixel art graphs and charts in the background looking tidy. Satisfying, organized, lo-fi UI. Text: 'Clean Stats'.
images.description: Representing the simplified Balance API and new Grafana dashboards.

images.prompt: A beautiful pixel art door or portal glowing with warm inviting light. A tiny pixel character is walking through. Represents the new 'Authorize Page' and account polish. Soft lime green (#ecf874) vines growing around the door frame. Magical, welcoming, cozy atmosphere like a safe save point in a game. Text: 'Fresh Entry'.
images.description: Visualizing the Account API improvements and Auth page redesign.

caption:

Here‚Äôs the tea on the latest updates:

üñºÔ∏è **Klein-9b Unlocked:** No more forced squares! Your aspect ratios are now free to roam.
üí∞ **Simple Math:** We simplified the Balance API. One number, zero stress.
üìä **Dashboard Glow Up:** New Grafana boards for BYOP and API usage. Satisfying stats only.
üö™ **Fresh Entrance:** The login/auth pages got a total makeover. It‚Äôs giving cozy.

Building soft tools for hard problems. üå±

alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images featuring a bee mascot, retro game UI elements, and glowing portals, all in soft pastel and lime green colors.
